channel.title: 2 Questions
channel.description:
I have two questions about web design. Question 1: How do I add a icon to the left of the adress bar like moparisthebest has the SCAR picture?
Question 2: How do I make my own error page so that when someone goes to a wrong adress on my site they lead to my designed page?
Greatly appreciated if you help me :D.

item.title: 2 Questions
item.dc:creator: @VB7_Rocks VB7 Rocks
item.description:
@VB7_Rocks wrote:

[quote=“D D 3, post:1, topic:211529”]I have two questions about web design.
Question 1:
How do I add a icon to the left of the adress bar like moparisthebest has the SCAR picture?[/quote]

Create a picture, and save it as favicon.ico in the root directory of your website.

[quote=“D D 3, post:1, topic:211529”]Question 2:
How do I make my own error page so that when someone goes to a wrong adress on my site they lead to my designed page?[/quote]

Depends on your host. Some have an option in the control panel, others require you to edit .htaccess files, and others don’t let you do it at all.

Read full topic
